name: Planet Ball
description:
If you crave late 2000s yoyogames nostalgia, this is the game for you.

Planet Ball is a physics-based adventure platformer in which you take control of Nurks, a brave individual from Ball Planet who takes on a quest to save his planet from bankruptcy. Soon he becomes unmotivated, but is forced to continue by his own peers. This game contains:

  • 15 levels of increasing difficulty. Plenty of different hazards and environments.
  • MIDIs that will make you look for the actual soundtrack of your childhood games.
  • Deep, meaningful (not really) conversations full of bland, family-friendly humor.
  • Puzzles. How can a ball solve puzzles? Well that isn't even the most surprising thing it can do!

Enjoy!
